securityStep.title: Authentication
securityStep.authModeInfoPopup: Select this checkbox if you want authentication mode to be modified for the selected user(s).</br>

summaryStep.title: Summary
summaryStep.statusUpdatedMsgEnabled: Status will be set to Enabled
summaryStep.statusUpdatedMsgDisabled: Status will be set to Disabled
summaryStep.pwdAgeingCustomizedDisabled: customized settings with password ageing disabled
summaryStep.pwdAgeingCustomizedEnabled: customized settings with password ageing set to {0} days and expire warning set to {1} days
summaryStep.pwdMaxAge: Number of days password is valid
summaryStep.pwdExpireWarning: Number of days to password expiration warning
summaryStep.adminUpdatedMsg: {0} user(s) with SECURITY_ADMIN role will be updated
summaryStep.assignedUpdatedMsgAssigned: Roles of {0} user(s) will be assigned
summaryStep.assignedUpdatedMsgUnassigned: Roles of {0} user(s) will be unassigned
summaryStep.unassignAdminRole: You are going to unassign SECURITY_ADMIN role from {0} user(s)
summaryStep.authModeUpdatedMsgLocal: Authentication mode of {0} user(s) will be set to Local
summaryStep.authModeUpdatedMsgRemote: Authentication mode of {0} user(s) will be set to Remote
summaryStep.cannotUnassignAllRoles: {0} user roles cannot be updated because user has to contain at least one role
summaryStep.noRolesSelected: No user role has been selected
summaryStep.unassignAllRoles: You are going to unassign all user roles. This operation is not allowed because user has to contain at least one role
